author: pipermerriam
content: In general (beyond quilt), there's very likely full time paid work available to anyone who: 0) some reasonable baseline of existing knowledge of our protocols 1) Is capable of gaining a deep understanding of our protocols 2) self-starter, self-motivated, able to operate without direct supervision 3) some level of ideological alignment 4) good communicator 5) adequate technical/programming capability to understand existing code, make hacky modifications to try things out, write proof of concepts

author: lightclient
content: But if you have someone in mind, feel free to connect us

author: atoulme
content: feel free to post to ethjobs.net, free to post
